patthana21.38:4.1: Nasahetukaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ahetuko sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.
patthana21.38:5.1: Naahetukaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ahetuko sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.
patthana21.38:5.5: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.38:6.2: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi … pe … aññamaññe ekaṃ … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.38:7.1: Nasahetukaṃ naanidassanaappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ahetuko anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.38:7.3: Hetuyā ekaṃ, adhipatiyā ekaṃ … pe … avigate ekaṃ.
patthana21.38:8.1: (Nahetusampayuttaṃ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ sahetukadukasadisaṃ. Tīṇi pañhā. Hetusahetukaduke ca hetuhetusampayuttaduke ca pañhā no labbhati.)
